column1: I\'m ___ years old it's getting cold I\'ve got my big coat on
But I miss screaming and crying and kissing in the rain
column2: It\'s 2AM and I\'m cursing your name

column1: You cry but you don\'t tell anyone
column2: that you might not be the golden one

column1: I see your face in my mind as I drive away
column2: Cause none of us thought it was gonna end that way
